interestingcomments.content: Much faster today! Some other sites were also slow yesterday and other NZ customers were reporting problems, so the problem may be this end but dependent on where the servers originate. If not the NSA, perhaps the federal shutdown in the US caused by politicians! Fingers crossed it's better now. I'd miss the forum!
